about_the_game: Race one of 4 cars across 2 full tracks for the Arcade mode of the game, master slipstreaming - fight to the finish - can you make the podium?
detailed_description: Race one of 4 cars across 2 full tracks for the Arcade mode of the game, master slipstreaming - fight to the finish - can you make the podium?
name: SP Grand Prix Demo

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Race one of 4 cars across 2 full tracks for the Arcade mode of the game, master slipstreaming - fight to the finish - can you make the podium?
